for (const row of this.rows) {
  for (let i = 0; i < row.length; i += 1) {
    let col = cols[i];
    if (!col) {
      col = {};
      cols.push(col);
    }
    const cell = row[i];
    if (cell.value) {
      col.size = Math.max(col.size || 0, cell.value.length);
    }
  }
}
